channel.title: PINKI LV.2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "PINKI LV.2" - WHY NOT LEVEL UP ??

item.title: Re: PINKI LV.2
item.content:encoded:
Has the +4% chance ever been verified? As far as I know, that was initially a theory, and I might have missed the confirmation on that.

For leveling the ninja: sometimes it will happen on the first try, sometimes it takes a lot of attempts to level up the ninja. Just keep running the missions and she should level up eventually.

item.title: Re: PINKI LV.2
item.content:encoded: Because you only have 25% chance to level up an ally on first completion. +4% added everytime you succeed in doing the mission. So the more you succeed, the greater chance of her/him levelling up. If he/she does not level up after completing that mission a lot of times, that's called RNG HATE.

item.title: PINKI LV.2
item.content:encoded:
Success!
She confesses, and the boy blows her off - but it's the thought that counts!

Your ninjas do not level, but you feel they may be stronger soon..

WHY ??? :((
